info.name: Nick Ng
info.summary: I'm Nick and I want to be a software developer because I enjoy building things and solving problems. I'm a self-taught programmer who learns quickly and independently and I am looking for opportunities to expand and develop my skills.

items.name: Guild Ball Health Tracker
items.info: A web-app to keep track of characters' health for the table-top game Guild Ball. Uses Socket.IO to share game information between two players and a spectator page. I originally started this because I though it would be interesting to develop and a equivalent tool didn't exist. I ended up learning a lot about UI design for mobile devices after using it during a game.

items.name: Tournament Organiser
items.info: A cloud-based tournament organisation web-app deployed on Heroku's cloud Platform-as-a-Service. It provides a place to store player details and tools to run the tournament. I started this project to learn Node.js, SQL and front-end development. As the project became larger, I had to learn strategies to stay on track such as maintaining a backlog.
